dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2160 IH: Promoting Health as Youth Skills In Classrooms And Life Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Fudge (for herself, Mr. Polis, and Mr. Lewis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To support and encourage the health and well-being of elementary school and secondary school students by enhancing school physical education and health education.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Promoting Health as Youth Skills In Classrooms And Life Act .

section.header: Health education and physical education as core academic subjects
section.text: Section 9101(11) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7801(11)) is amended by striking and geography and inserting geography, physical education, and health education.
